name: 2020 The Game
description:
Follow the link to the game:

https://www.coregames.com/games/a8fe98/2020-the-game

A game where all the memes and the incidents happened at once.
Fight against each other in a semi riot form to get most kills.

Featuring Covid-19, Kobe, Black Panther, WW3, Volcano erupting, floods of Philippines, and the Forst fires of Austratia.

Please leave a like
